name: mHealthAI
description: We help corporate personalize their wellness calendar, create focused groups, engage employees through stepathon challenges, teleconsultation, diet & nutrition consultation, mindfulness sessions, and other wellness programs. Our performance dashboards help HR Leaders improve the efficacy and engagement in the program. Our open architecture approach helps us seamlessly integrate with partner networks and provide a B2B Wellness marketplace to customers.
Headline: AI-powered community-based wellness platform for corporates
ShortDescription: mHealthAI helps corporate to personalize their employee wellness and engagement.

Highlights.name: Analytics & Dashboard
Highlights.description: Discover the power of mHealth and revolutionize the way your employees access healthcare services!

Highlights.name: Corporate Microsite
Highlights.description: A corporate microsite offers a personalized and visually compelling experience for your target audience, ideal for events, launches, and campaigns.

Highlights.name: Customized Programs
Highlights.description: mHealth offers convenient and cost-effective solutions that can improve your workforce's health and well-being.

enhanced_description: mHealthAI is an AI-powered community-based wellness platform designed for corporates. It helps organizations personalize their employee wellness and engagement by offering a range of programs including stepathon challenges, teleconsultation, diet & nutrition consultation, and mindfulness sessions. The platform allows for the creation of focused employee groups and provides customized wellness programs. HR Leaders benefit from performance dashboards and analytics to improve program efficacy and engagement. mHealthAI also features a corporate microsite for a personalized and visually compelling experience and an open architecture approach for seamless integration with partner networks, enabling a B2B Wellness marketplace.
key_use_cases: Improving wellness program efficacy and engagement for HR leaders
Facilitating access to a B2B Wellness marketplace
Enabling corporate microsites for personalized user experiences
competitive_advantages: Open architecture for seamless partner integration
Comprehensive performance dashboards and analytics for HR leaders
Ability to create focused employee groups
Breadth of wellness program offerings (teleconsultation, diet & nutrition, mindfulness, stepathons)
Dedicated corporate microsite for a personalized user experience
Convenient and cost-effective solutions for workforce well-being
implementation_scenarios: Deployment of a dedicated corporate microsite
